title: Lord Krishna's love for Vidura | Sri Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa
speaker: HG Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa

segments.key_quote: This is the love of Krishna.
segments.summary: Krishna demonstrates his love for Vidura by accepting and eating a banana peel offered with devotion, contrasting it with Duryodhana's opulent but less sincere offerings.
